Punch/Jaws/Some Protectobots:



Punch layed in his recharge bed, off duty inside the Alliance base, energy 
entering his body in preperationf or his next shift.

---

Jaws continued prowling underwater, the shark having eaten a few fish to keep 
his energy sustained.  He was rather board, and wished there weren't so many 
cowards in the war who would only attack weak targets and not take on a 
strong target, such as the Alliance.

===

In the Element, in the CR chambers, Groove and Streetwise remained in CR 
chambers, their serious wounds being healed steadily.
